title: S5 support main looking 4 Adc,Top,mid,and jungler
body: I don't care about your solo Q ranking if your willing to be on a team with me then cool. I main thresh support but I can play any support well. Give me a chance I won't let you down. We will do well if you just communicate with me. I'd like a shot caller jungler.but I will call out bad shots noting personal.

replies.body: i main adc and am dying to be in a ranked 5's team who will actually play constantly

Hey there I main jg but I also love to top and mid, add me. I really want to be in a 5v5 ranked team thing because I feel like in solo q the people i play with people aren't that good and don't really want to strive for higher ranks
hey i main mid! you can add me
